title: Plat 1 ADC Looking for Flex Group
body: Looking for a good flex team.

replies.body: lol? you really shouldn't talk shit if you are more then 7 ranks lower then me. Go talk shit else where scrub. Also, i'm glad that im a jax, panth and kayle main (; i just play it in flex mostly rere. u like that? 89 percent win rate? ranked 600 in the world so fuck off.
you probably shouldn't name yourself "King of MF" if you are only gonna have a 46% W/R...
